lyrics.ChnStr: 當你在穿山越嶺的另一邊
lyrics.EngStr: When you're on the other side of the mountain

lyrics.ChnStr: 我在孤獨的路上沒有盡頭
lyrics.EngStr: I am on a lonely road with no end

lyrics.ChnStr: 一輩子有多少的來不及
lyrics.EngStr: How many things in life are too late

lyrics.ChnStr: 發現已經失去最重要的東西
lyrics.EngStr: Realizing we've already lost the most important things

lyrics.ChnStr: 恍然大悟早已遠去
lyrics.EngStr: Suddenly realizing it's already gone

lyrics.ChnStr: 為何總是在犯錯之後
lyrics.EngStr: Why is it always after making mistakes

lyrics.ChnStr: 才肯相信錯的是自己
lyrics.EngStr: That we only believe the one at fault is ourselves

lyrics.ChnStr: 他們說這就是人生
lyrics.EngStr: They say this is life

lyrics.ChnStr: 試著體會
lyrics.EngStr: Trying to understand

lyrics.ChnStr: 試著忍住眼淚
lyrics.EngStr: Trying to hold back tears

lyrics.ChnStr: 還是躲不開應該有的情緒
lyrics.EngStr: Still unable to avoid the emotions I should feel

lyrics.ChnStr: 我不會奢求世界停止轉動
lyrics.EngStr: I won't ask the world to stop spinning

lyrics.ChnStr: 我知道逃避一點都沒有用
lyrics.EngStr: I know avoiding doesn't help at all

lyrics.ChnStr: 只是這段時間裡
lyrics.EngStr: It's just that during this time

lyrics.ChnStr: 尤其在夜裡
lyrics.EngStr: Especially at night

lyrics.ChnStr: 還是會想起難忘的事情
lyrics.EngStr: I still think about unforgettable things

lyrics.ChnStr: 我想我的思念是一種病
lyrics.EngStr: I think my longing is a kind of illness

lyrics.ChnStr: 久久不能痊癒
lyrics.EngStr: It can't heal for a long time

lyrics.ChnStr: 當你在穿山越嶺的另一邊
lyrics.EngStr: When you're on the other side of the mountain

lyrics.ChnStr: 我在孤獨的路上沒有盡頭
lyrics.EngStr: I am on a lonely road with no end

lyrics.ChnStr: 時常感覺你在耳後的呼吸
lyrics.EngStr: Often feeling your breath behind my ear

lyrics.ChnStr: 卻未曾感覺你在心口的鼻息
lyrics.EngStr: But never feeling your breath on my heart

lyrics.ChnStr: 汲汲營營忘記身邊的人需要愛和關心
lyrics.EngStr: Busy forgetting that those around me need love and care

lyrics.ChnStr: 藉口總是拉遠了距離
lyrics.EngStr: Excuses always create distance

lyrics.ChnStr: 不知不覺無聲無息
lyrics.EngStr: Unknowingly, silently

lyrics.ChnStr: 我們總是在抱怨事與願違
lyrics.EngStr: We are always complaining about things not going as we wish

lyrics.ChnStr: 卻不願意回頭看看自己
lyrics.EngStr: But we refuse to look back at ourselves

lyrics.ChnStr: 想想自己
lyrics.EngStr: Thinking about myself

lyrics.ChnStr: 到底做了什麼蠢事情
lyrics.EngStr: What foolish things I've done

lyrics.ChnStr: 也許是上帝給我一個試煉
lyrics.EngStr: Maybe it's a trial given by God

lyrics.ChnStr: 只是這傷口需要花點時間
lyrics.EngStr: But this wound needs some time

lyrics.ChnStr: 只是會想念過去的一切
lyrics.EngStr: But I still miss everything from the past

lyrics.ChnStr: 那些人事物會離我遠去
lyrics.EngStr: Those people and things will drift far away

lyrics.ChnStr: 而我們終究也會遠離變成回憶
lyrics.EngStr: And we will eventually fade away into memories

lyrics.EngStr: When you're on the other side of the mountain

lyrics.ChnStr: 我在孤獨的路上沒有盡頭
lyrics.EngStr: I am on a lonely road with no end

lyrics.ChnStr: 時常感覺你在耳後的呼吸
lyrics.EngStr: Often feeling your breath behind my ear

lyrics.ChnStr: 卻未曾感覺你在心口的鼻息
lyrics.EngStr: But never feeling your breath on my heart

lyrics.EngStr: When you're on the other side of the mountain

lyrics.EngStr: I am on a lonely road with no end

lyrics.EngStr: Often feeling your breath behind my ear

lyrics.ChnStr: 卻未曾感覺你在心口的鼻息
lyrics.EngStr: But never feeling your breath on my heart

lyrics.ChnStr: Oh 思念是一種病
lyrics.EngStr: Oh, longing is an illness

lyrics.ChnStr: Oh 思念是一種病 一種病
lyrics.EngStr: Oh, longing is an illness, an illness
